pullRequest.title: Simplify child classes of  AbstractForumPoster
pullRequest.bodyText:
Largely merging methods from child classes that are the same into their parent class
An interesting set of 4 methods returning boolean all returned false or true from child class, consolidated this to just one method

 
Functional Changes

[] Feature Removal
[x] Code Cleanup or refactor
[] Configuration Change
[] Problem fix:  
[] Other:   
Testing

[] Manual testing done

commit.message: Refactor, consolidate unncessary method overrides into abstract class and inline.

Consolidate abstract methods, fix data clump code smell.

The two abstract classes EndTurnPanel and MoveForumPosterPanel override
4 boolean returning methods and each returns the same value for each
method override. These 4 methods can be replaced with a single method.

nodes.bodyText: This is a consolidation of the 4 parameters to one, each child class was uniform in returning a true or false, so we only need one value here.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -90,10 +90,7 @@ public ForumPosterComponent layoutComponents(
       final IAbstractForumPosterDelegate forumPosterDelegate,
       final TripleAFrame frame,
       final boolean hasPosted,
-      final boolean allowIncludeTerritorySummary,
-      final boolean allowIncludeProductionSummary,
-      final boolean allowDiceBattleDetails,
-      final boolean allowDiceStatistics) {
+      final boolean includeDetailsAndSummary) {

nodes.bodyText: Small simplification, change from a method reference to qualifier.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -126,7 +117,7 @@ public ForumPosterComponent layoutComponents(
     add(
         new JButtonBuilder()
             .title("Done")
-            .actionListener(doneAction::run)
+            .actionListener(doneAction)

nodes.bodyText: Both child classes instatiated and set the parent 'forumPosterComponent' exactly the same way in their constructors. Consolidated this to the parent class here.
Inlined this method, used to be an abstract, both child classes had the same implementation.
Ditto on inline of duplicate implementations.

'waitForEndTurn' just calls 'waitForDone'. The child implementations in both cases just called their parent class. So we can remove the 'waitForEndturn' method, and remove the 'waitForDone' overrides on the child classes.

commit.message: Restore toString overrides until it can be sure it is safe to remove
